website_summaries.verdict: High-quality materials in a wall-mounted towel warmer with a stylish curved bar design.
pros: Contains stainless steel materials that will resist rust and give you a long-lasting performance
Large heated rack area of 31.5" x 23.5" to handle multiple towels
Curved design in the heating bars looks nice
Contains 10 heating bars for a thorough performance level
cons: Must be hardwired into your wiring system
Can cause skin burns if touched directly

customer_reviews.title: Great towel warmer, but BEWARE it can cause burns!
customer_reviews.text: We have ours hard wired outside of our master shower. It dries damp towels quickly and does as advertised, but use EXTREME caution around it if there are no towels hanging on it. My husband and I have both burnt our arms accidentally bumping into it. My husband was the latest victim...as you can see it is hot enough to cause second degree burns simply by briefly touching it.
customer_reviews.author: Bames_TX

customer_reviews.title: A warm and toasty towel is a great simple luxury to have every morning.
customer_reviews.text: Gained a taste for liking towel warming bars when traveling in NZ last spring. It's about the heat that a 100 watt incandescent light bulb puts out and that's perfect. This is definitely one of my favorite creature comforts for our home improvements. I had an electrician do the rough in, tapping in to a nearby gfci outlet. Installed this myself, easily. It's perfectly big enough for two normal sized bath towels. Love having a toasty warm and dry towel to wake up to every morning. A must have add on is a programmable timer switch. I bought the Honeywell wall timer that Amazon recommended. Buy them both, you won't regret it. I promise.
customer_reviews.author: Not a doctor..

customer_reviews.title: Good product but you need to weave towels to heat
customer_reviews.text: Pros: heats up quickly, gets very hot. Discrete on/off button at the bottom. This small button lights up when heating so you know when it’s on. Cons: you need to weave your towels through the bars in order to heat the towels. (Otherwise they barely get warm.) And you need to do this before the device heats up otherwise you will burn yourself. This product gets HOT. Also, no automatic shutoff.
customer_reviews.author: anika r hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Nice Warm Towels
customer_reviews.text: I like the house cool... And of course my wife likes it warm... So, I installed the towel warmer with a programmable on / off switch. (Switch - Recommended for both convenience and safety). The Wife, and now the Daughter, both love it... Installation is easy, if you are reasonable handy with drywall expansion screws, precision wall markings, and electricity. I did upgrade the drywall expansion screws to a larger size (Strongly recommended with children). We have been using the towel warmer for two months now and all is good. Happy Days!!! Next upgrade is cabinet plate warmer... Still looking.
customer_reviews.author: Hard Working American

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered two of these. The first thing we noticed is that they got so hot that you could burn yourself on them. The first one stopped working within a week and the second only lasted two months. Now we can't return it because the return window is up. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Y.

customer_reviews.title: Very Unhappy With This Purchase
customer_reviews.text: The electrician had a difficult time installing the towel warmer. He spent hours trying to get it to work which cost us quite a bit of money. Even with the warmer on for an hour, only tiny bits of the towel was warm and forget warming more than one towel at a time. The bars were very hot though. I'm very unhappy with this purchase and unfortunately, I missed the return window so I'm out close to $240 on something we can't use. We've removed it from the wall. This was a very expensive lesson on what not to buy.
customer_reviews.author: J. K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I put in my new House!
customer_reviews.text: Heats towels up quickly! But be careful with small children, it is HOT to the touch. Only thing I wish bars were further apart so i could intertwine my towels more easily, but that is being picky. Great product. I am buying extra so if they ever go out in the next 20 years, i will have one that will fit exactly into it's holes on the wall, and therefore avoid having costly repairs to fit a new, different sized one onto my wall.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Check and Install within 30 days.  If faulty Amazon does not allow for a return
customer_reviews.text: Product does not work, was installed in a new house so did not get installed until end of February and site does not allow for a return.

customer_reviews.title: Too hot and hard to switch no and off
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought this I wrote to ask if it got too hot to have children around it when on. I was told it would not get too hot. Wrong! It gets very hot to the touch and no way to turn it down in temp. Dries towels very well but dangerous to bump into. Also the on-off switch is inconveniently located at the very bottom of one of the side bars and you have to bend down and feel around to turn it off and on - not an easy , simple switch at all. You should certainly get a programmable thermostat that can control it.
customer_reviews.author: AS Lyman

customer_reviews.title: Best towel warmer in the market!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Amba makes an awesome towel warmer. The price is fabulous, especially when compared to other towel warmers on the market. I’ve saved $$ not having to wash my towels everyday plus the wear and tear on numerous washings. My towels last longer and they are always completely dry between showers. Nothing is worse when your towels are dry in between bathing! I’ve called customer service at Amba and they immediately answer the phone and help you with any install questions. I could never live without this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. After installing the rack which has worked ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. After installing the rack which has worked well from January 2014 to last week, The element died and its not heating anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Auriolette

customer_reviews.title: Life expectancy
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one - same model - and we love the toasty-warm towels. My concern is that the first one only lasted 4 years. Is that the true life expectancy or was the first one an anomaly? I have light bulbs that lasted longer - and I’m not talking about LEDs. Anyway, service was quick shipping was quick and we love it
customer_reviews.author: Robert Foster

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT heat enough to even warm the towels
customer_reviews.text: I like the look, Just installed a couple of days ago. Barely warms up enough to even get the towels warm. I can even touch the bars after being on for a 4 hours! I read all the reviews and everyone talks about it burning them, not even close. My husband tried to stop me from buying this, I am sorry I bought it now, as he was right, it is a very expensive towel HOLDER!
customer_reviews.author: Miabear

customer_reviews.title: The measurements in the instruction are wrong and the product I received was bent
customer_reviews.text: This is a manufacturing issue. The towel rack was carefully packaged and was not damaged in shipping. After mounting the four lugs squarely and per the instruction, the rack would not mount. Upon further inspect, the internal nut was offset at an angle so the mounted bracket (one of four) was not perpendicular to the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Charles E. Goldblum

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it and get the one with the plug, best thing I've bought in a long time. Other reviewers say it burns the towels but I have not experienced that. My towels are nice and toasty. The frame is hot to the touch so you have to be a little careful. I would recommend this one to everyone, it is very stylish and looks great on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm towels, happy body
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn’t enjoy warm towels after a bath or shower? This has been a wonderful addition to our bathroom and used daily. We added a separate timer which has been helpful to pre-warm and allows for automatic shutoff. We keep two towels on this so only part of the towel warms up. One towel would be able to warm all over.
customer_reviews.author: Roaming Rotarian

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This towel rack gets way too hot and will burn your towels. Do not buy it!
customer_reviews.author: MBPaul

customer_reviews.title: It's Alright.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if this is the norm but my towels don't really get more than just a hint of warmth. It could be because the rounded inside prevents the towel from contact. I weave the towel but it still doesn't get very warm. It's attractive hardware. Doesn't do bad on my rob which I hang from the side. Since it is hardwired I try different things to see if it works one way better than the other.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Great to warm up a towel on a cold day!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to warm up a towel. I did not give it a 5 only because it takes a while for it to get really warm. I turn it on 1/2 hour before I am ready to use the towel. If I wait until I get in the shower to turn it on, the towel is sufficiently warm enough for me. I would not leave it on all the time because it could burn someone should they accidently touch the bars.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Sleek look, great quality
customer_reviews.text: I researched heated towel bars for quite some time... I love this one... Rounded, smooth attractive frame. My electrician installed it - back when the bathroom was back to studs. Easy for him... I like that you can have this towel warmer hooked up to a timer - I have 2 absent minded daughters. Gives the bathroom a nice, modern look.
customer_reviews.author: mike millre

customer_reviews.title: Toasty towels
customer_reviews.text: Works GREAT. Warm towels all winter. An absolute must is to purchase a programmable switch to install with your towel rack so your towels can be warming while you're hitting snooze. The dimensions and installation sheet provided with the rack are accurate and informative. I recommend unreservedly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rogan

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely luxurious!
customer_reviews.text: Warm towels are such a luxury. We have had curved towel racks by Amba for a couple of months. We really like them and are glad that the electrician recommended that we put timers on them. These Amba towel racks are beautiful. We selected the curved racks, but if your bathroom is narrow, you may want to consider the standard style since the curved rack protrude out a bit more. Timers are not necessary, but for us, they're great having.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: I loved it. When we moved to a new condo ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. When we moved to a new condo we wanted to replicate the towel warmer we had in our previous home. This is great. It keeps two thick bath towels toasty warm, actually much better than our 10 year old warmer. We keep it turned on all the time. We'll see how much running the equivalent of a 150 Watt light bulb is going to affect our electric bill.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly G.

customer_reviews.title: Toasty warm towels we love the look of this warmer
customer_reviews.text: Toasty warm towels we love the look of this warmer. Very modern looking, sleek design. Towels seem warmer then another brand warmer we used. Would purchase again for another bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: JNS

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Big fan! We build this into a remodel to have it wired directly to a timer switch. No wires are visible. One towel will cover the entire unit, but if you hang one on the lower half and one on the top, they still dry nicely even while not right on the bars.
customer_reviews.author: msmoll91

customer_reviews.title: Heating element died within 30 days
customer_reviews.text: This was installed by a trusted electrician, so no concerns about quality of electricity/install. Fortunately, it died just before the return window expired. Now I'm stuck fixing holes in the wall & out the install fees.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Hair Errywar

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, but lacking one essential feature
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking warmer. My one major complaint is that it should come with a built-in timer, given the price I payed.
customer_reviews.author: G J N

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and works just fine. We have it wired to a timer that turns it on and off on our schedule rather than letting it run continuously. This is one of those "affordable luxuries".
customer_reviews.author: mompantero

customer_reviews.title: finally it died
customer_reviews.text: After 16 months mine failed today. It sizzled and popped and is finished. Will see if company will do anything for me
customer_reviews.author: Casey S.

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected!
customer_reviews.text: It's well made, warms towels nicely and can be installed by a "do-it-yourselfer", if skilled. Installed hardwired with added digital timer/switch. You must be very precise laying out the hollow wall anchors and have backup anchors as those provided are very brittle and break easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like this towel warmer and use it daily during the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this towel warmer and use it daily during the cold season. However, I'd love to find a way to get the entire towel warmer, not just the part that drapes over the top of it. I'd recommend buying a countdown timer with it.
customer_reviews.author: jyg

customer_reviews.title: Great value and very pleased with the quality
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Installation was relatively straight forward. Take time to line up the anchors for mounting because there is no room for anything more than very minor alignment. Used a timer switch with it to turn it on and off automatically. Great value and very pleased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pt

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully finished! We haven’t installed it yet, but everything appeares to be in order for a simple installation. I can’t wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Unit had been opened before. Some parts had been ...
customer_reviews.text: Unit had been opened before. Some parts had been swapped out for old parts. Plastic end caps were cracked, one missing. Two anchors had sheetrock dust. Should have refused delivery when it arrived as repackaged. Used product before, got 6 years of continuous use before it died. Their repackaging of returned goods needs some work.
customer_reviews.author: jr

customer_reviews.title: Warm towels
customer_reviews.text: The item does what it is supposed to. Takes a few minutes to warm the towels, but does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: Sam003pa

customer_reviews.title: arrived quickly, well packaged. had to wait FOREVER ...
customer_reviews.text: arrived quickly, well packaged. had to wait FOREVER for the contractor to confirm we could install it close enough to the new tub. We just have a switch instead of a thermostat that we may change out later but I turn it on when I get in the shower and the towel is warm and delightful when I get out!
customer_reviews.author: TBT

customer_reviews.title: install is easy, sticks out from the wall more than needed ...
customer_reviews.text: heats up really fast, install is easy, sticks out from the wall more than needed is my only complaint
customer_reviews.author: Gary Borrmann

customer_reviews.title: It was wonderful while it lasted!
customer_reviews.text: Our towels were nice and warm waiting for us when we got out of the shower UNTIL TONIGHT!!! Two years of bliss and now it's all over as our towel warmer no longer works. A product that costs this much really should last much longer then then two years.
customer_reviews.author: kat64

customer_reviews.title: Dangerously hot!
customer_reviews.text: This product is 'frequently bought with' a thermostat bc the product runs way too hot. I called company because im worried about my children getting burned (yes its that hot). We had installed by a liscenced electrician who immediately brought the heat to our attention. The company DOES NOT CARE! Buyer beware!!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Kingsland

customer_reviews.title: Really Love this Towel Warmer
customer_reviews.text: Personally we love this product, and we did buy the additional timer which we use mostly on a manual setting but sometimes automatic. It heats up really quickly and we have not found it to be 'too hot' as in some folks experience. Adds a really luxurious finish to our newly remodeled bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Francgar

customer_reviews.title: Nice but you have to turn on early before you ...
customer_reviews.text: Takes awhile to warm towels and if you leave on burns towels. Nice but you have to turn on early before you need a towel.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mandeville

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my towels warm and dry, no moldy musty smells. Attractive.
customer_reviews.author: A. E. Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Really love
customer_reviews.text: A must for everyone when you get out from shower you think your ina spa with your hot towel.Really love it
customer_reviews.author: Micheline

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this towel warmer January 2014 really liked it but now seems it has ran its life span! Won't heat anymore i believe the heating element has stopped working! Not happy after having an electrician hard wire it and the cost of it you think it would last longer!
customer_reviews.author: nancy rutledge

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it - I'm happy. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I installed it with the 7 day programmable switch. It needs about one hour before the shower to really warm up and maybe another hour after to dry the towels. It gets really hot to the touch. It does not heat the bathroom. Installation was easy. Chances are that you will not hit the wall studs with all screws. I recommend using toggle lock drywall anchors if anchoring to drywall. The anchors that come with the product will pull out.
customer_reviews.author: vear

customer_reviews.title: Style and efficiency
customer_reviews.text: This towel warmer was easy to install though took a little time to get hardwired in. It works great and dries towels beautifully. I have always afforded myself the luxury of having heated towel warmers in my homes. They are inexpensive to operate and keep the towels toasty warm. Wouldn't be without one.
customer_reviews.author: Dean L.

customer_reviews.title: A necessary luxury!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Our electrician commented that it was the easiest to install towel warmer he has seen. Works well. Looks good. The towels dry quickly and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: ikcw

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and it really heats up quickly
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and it really heats up quickly. I installed it a few days ago and have been very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the look and quality of the Amba RWH-CB
customer_reviews.text: As part of a complete bathroom remodel we purchased this heated towel rack. Very happy with the look and quality of the Amba RWH-CB.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: looks awesome, towels are nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: Went in well, looks awesome, towels are nice and warm. Use the Honeywell timer in your install; I run mine from 3am to 9am.
customer_reviews.author: DrDurst

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Installed for a remodel client of ours ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Installed for a remodel client of ours by an electrician. It is great looking and an excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: ... our bathroom for over 2 years and it works great.
customer_reviews.text: All the info I researched on this product so far has stood up to the writeups I found - we have had it installed in our bathroom for over 2 years and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: heidi

customer_reviews.title: best purchase in a while
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe I waited this long, best purchase in a while...no regrets. May have to update the guest bathroom soon.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Hotter than expected
customer_reviews.text: DIY install no problem . Works as advertised. Hotter than expected
customer_reviews.author: D. Darby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great heat and warmth. Will take 2 towels if they're medium size.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie W. Stewart III

customer_reviews.title: Keep Looking
customer_reviews.text: Our much loved towel warmer died and this is its replacement. Paid the electrician $140 for the install so it's now up and running and looks good. Put a timer on it so it's warm for morning showers .. In theory. Unfortunately this unit as a towel warmer sucks. Tried 30 min to 90 minutes and I would say the towel is not warm enough to make it worth the cost. During the install the electrician warned me that 150 watts was pretty low and questioned how well it would heat. Should have listened and returned the unit right then. Very bummed!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Compton

customer_reviews.title: Best feeling ever is a hot warm towel after a ...
customer_reviews.text: Hard wired this unit. On/off switch I rarely use. Extremely hot. Towels dry fast. Best feeling ever is a hot warm towel after a hot shower. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what it claims to be. Gets nice and hot. Sturdy construction. Was missing the hardware to the cover plate and one set screw was a blank that was not formed right....but I figure I can get those at a local hardware store. Nothing major.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R. West

customer_reviews.title: Love the flexibility this rack offers
customer_reviews.text: Love the flexibility this rack offers. It can be operated from a timer or by just pressing the on/off switch at the bottom of the left vertical bar.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great heating, great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it, brushed nickel doesn't stick out too far, great heating!
customer_reviews.author: Fin's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great item for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great item for a great price! Gets hot fast and keeps my towels warm and dry. Looks great on my wall.
customer_reviews.author: PETER DOUPIS

customer_reviews.title: Warm towels are a wonderful thing...
customer_reviews.text: I now have two of these (one curved, the other straight) and they do exactly what they are built for: a nice toasty towel. I had mine professionally installed in new construction so there are no fit and finish problems. Note that the on/off switch (on the bottom of one of the vertical tubes) is waterproofed by a plastic membrane which makes it a bit fiddly when trying to operate. It is a lighted switch but its placement on the bottom of the pole can make it hard to see in a well-lit bathroom. Not a real issue, just something to be aware of.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Lots of wife points!
customer_reviews.text: 150 watts and 1.3 amps. I didn't need a separate circuit. Nice. She thought I couldn't surprise her any more. Got a lot of points for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Roger G.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works as well as expected. Must weave the towels into the spaces to heats through.
customer_reviews.author: Working for a living

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does not heat up hot enough to adequately warm the towel.
customer_reviews.author: Emma P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice towel bar
customer_reviews.text: The towel warmer is built well, and is stylish. There weren't any defects, and it was packaged well, and all parts complete. Nice towel bar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classy Look and Great Construction
customer_reviews.text: The Towel Warmer arrived in good packaging with all the parts need for installation. The 304 stainless steel construction is solid and substantial. The instructions were a little vague in spots but this is an install that you should leave to a professional. The rack must me mounted to the wall in perfect alignment with your hard wired electrical box and although there is a switch on the rack - I opted to install an external timer. (The switch on the rack is located at the bottom of the left upright bar.) The unit draws about 150 watts when powered and takes about 5 minutes to get hot. I am very pleased with this addition to out bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Kanwells

customer_reviews.title: Nice warm towels
customer_reviews.text: A great adder to the renovated master bathroom. Towels are warm and dry. Best for those cold NE winters.

customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, but would be nice if it got hotter fast

customer_reviews.title: the uncurved may be a better choice. Love getting out of the shower and ...
customer_reviews.text: heats quickly. On/off switch difficult to operate and difficult to find. Curved towel rack very modern. Be sure to check you have enough room for the curve. If the towel rack is behind a door in a tight space, the uncurved may be a better choice. Love getting out of the shower and wrapping up in a toasty warm towel. Would recommend to others.

customer_reviews.text: Item works great when you read the installation instructions first. Easy to install if you are handy with tools, otherwise hire a professional to do so. customer_reviews.title: Awesome towel warming rack!

customer_reviews.title: Good to warm towels for drying but for me
customer_reviews.text: Good to warm towels for drying but for me, does not get hot enough to feel like you have toasty towels. Installed well and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Barry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Towel warmer works extremely well and we are enjoying warm, dry towels.
customer_reviews.author: beth g.

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great, Functions OK
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -looks great -seems very solid -not terribly difficult to install Cons: -length of time to warm towel The rack looks great in our bathroom and wasn't too difficult to install, but it takes a bit of time to fully warm up your towel. It needs a minimum of 30 minutes to make a difference and feel any bit of warmth on the towel. That's a little excessive in my opinion. If you don't remember to turn it on well before your shower, it isn't worth the effort to use it. I installed it with a push button digital countdown switch which comes in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this same product previously for my master bath. Now that I'm remodeling a guest bathroom, I wanted to put in the same towel warmer. The design is gorgeous and it is so wonderful to have heated towels and other items. I hang my robe on the top edge and it stays warm and toasty. Love this product. Since I bought my first one last year, I can't imagine not having a towel warmer in my bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaK

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Love it to heat the towels and then ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Love it to heat the towels and then dry them too.
customer_reviews.author: Hanah Fields-Austin

customer_reviews.title: wish it was on timer to turn off if we ...
customer_reviews.text: wish it was on timer to turn off if we forget to turn it off- I often see light glowing late at night and have to get up and turn it off because others forgot
customer_reviews.author: TBP

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, poor execution.
customer_reviews.text: Looked great but performed poorly. Uneven heating and poor wire placement made this a terrible item to install on studs. Basically, the wire arm will land on top of a stud if you try to install on a stud. The only way to land on studs and wire it too is to install it 90 degrees to its side... Worthless. Installed on drywall, failed to heat evenly and caused internal connection problems. Returned promptly after installing. There needs to be an option to allow the wire arm to land to the side of a stud... It's only common sense.
customer_reviews.author: S.Z.

customer_reviews.title: Warmed the towel only where it folded over the top ...
customer_reviews.text: Warmed the towel only where it folded over the top of the warmer. The warmer got very hot in about 3 minutes. Left towel on the hot rack for up to 30 minutes and only the part of the towel at the top where the towel folded over the top bar, did the towel get warm. we will remove this towel warmer and go with cold towels hanging on a hook.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Kring

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful, but it takes at least 30 min. For towel to get warm. Even then it's not toasty.

customer_reviews.text: Don't know what I did without one before we bought this one. It works well and even adds heat to the bathroom. However we don't have small children and the unit can get pretty warm to touch including the side rails.

customer_reviews.title: Great company,
customer_reviews.text: Very nice towel warmer. Product performs as advertised & was not to difficult to install. We added a remote on-off. Cudoes to the company for exceptional customer service.

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works great! True to description. The bars get hot to the touch, but not so hot as maybe a curling iron. I'm still working on the best way to hang towels so they get warm all over.

customer_reviews.title: My builder had to twist and turn it to straighten ...
customer_reviews.text: My builder had to twist and turn it to straighten it out after coming out of the pkg. It was on an angle. I also did not know it did not have a shut off switch so not so safe - again my handy builder saved the day.
customer_reviews.author: NobleNurse

customer_reviews.title: Quit working 4-1/2 months after installed
customer_reviews.text: DON'T BUY THIS ONE. Looks great. Worked great for a little while, but it just went cold. Switch still lights up, but there is no heat. Now my towels are cold.

customer_reviews.title: Radiant towel warmer
customer_reviews.text: The Radiant towel warmer warms up nicely and warms my towel before my shower and dries my towel after my shower. This means my towel does not get a mildewy smell.
customer_reviews.author: Avidreader

customer_reviews.title: Love the towel warmer.
customer_reviews.text: We just installed this in our new construction. Have not yet had the opportunity to use it. Installation was pretty easy but then my husband is a contractor.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Rohrich

customer_reviews.title: Long term reliability - Heating element stopped working after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: We have used this towel bar for he past 2 years until the heating element stopped working a week ago. Warranty says 3 years, let's see how well Amba supports this one. Overall construction seems solid, nice looking and a good value - that is until it died. Too bad, we really did want to like this one.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Warm Towels in the Morning!!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertized. We have been using this for 2 weeks. I have it controlled by a Honeywell 7-day Programmable timer and I have it set to turn on about 2 hours before expected use. It is wonderful to grab a warm towel after showering.
customer_reviews.author: KCS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Just as advertised. I called the manufacturer during installation and the customer service was fenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: Smartens

customer_reviews.title: Only worked two days.
customer_reviews.text: I had an electrician put this up and install a timer. Worked for two days. Then stopped working. Light comes on, like it's on, but unit does not heat up. Having to take it down and send it back. Huge pain. Very disappointed and this does not give me much confidence in the product. Hoping the replacement works great for years to come, but I'm skeptical now.

customer_reviews.text: This is very functional and works well. I hand wash my sports stuff and hand it on to dry gently.
customer_reviews.author: Mouse2

customer_reviews.title: How did we live without this?!
customer_reviews.text: I love having a warm towel after a bath or shower. It warms up quickly and I paired it with a programmable wall switch, so I don't have to remember to turn it off. The construction is good and it looks good on the wall of the bathroom (i.e. my wife doesn't object to it!)

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Good size, good heat. The downsize relates to the on/off switch: it is UNDER one of the side pillars so you cannot see it. You have to know, or guess, if you are turning it on/off. Bad design feature.
